trans-unit.source: These guidelines describe how to design effective Help content for your app.
trans-unit.target: These guidelines describe how to design effective Help content for your app.

trans-unit.source: Help content should be a single page and can include text, links, and images.
trans-unit.target: Help content should be a single page and can include text, links, and images.

trans-unit.source: If you need to provide dynamic Help content, link to a support website or embed an online page in your Help section.
trans-unit.target: If you need to provide dynamic Help content, link to a support website or embed an online page in your Help section.

trans-unit.source: Should my app include Help content?
trans-unit.target: Should my app include Help content?

trans-unit.source: It's up to you whether to include Help; not every app needs a designated Help section.
trans-unit.target: It's up to you whether to include Help; not every app needs a designated Help section.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you app contains only one or two UI elements that might confuse a user, you could integrate [instructional UI](instructional-ui.md), create a simple in-app demo, or consider redesigning those elements instead of creating a separate help section.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you app contains only one or two UI elements that might confuse a user, you could integrate [instructional UI](instructional-ui.md), create a simple in-app demo, or consider redesigning those elements instead of creating a separate help section.

trans-unit.source: If you do create a designated Help section, it's best to keep it as succinct as possible.
trans-unit.target: If you do create a designated Help section, it's best to keep it as succinct as possible.

trans-unit.source: Recommendations
trans-unit.target: Recommendations

trans-unit.source: Keep Help pages short and easy for users to browse.
trans-unit.target: Keep Help pages short and easy for users to browse.

trans-unit.source: If your Help content doesn't fit on a single page or if you need to include dynamic content that'll need updating, link to a support website or embed an online page in your Help flyout.
trans-unit.target: If your Help content doesn't fit on a single page or if you need to include dynamic content that'll need updating, link to a support website or embed an online page in your Help flyout.

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that linking to a web page takes your user out of the app experience.
trans-unit.target: Keep in mind that linking to a web page takes your user out of the app experience.

trans-unit.source: If possible, embed the online content to create a more cohesive user experience.
trans-unit.target: If possible, embed the online content to create a more cohesive user experience.

trans-unit.source: Avoid technical terms and jargon.
trans-unit.target: Avoid technical terms and jargon.

trans-unit.source: Don't use Help to document all your app features.
trans-unit.target: Don't use Help to document all your app features.

trans-unit.source: If you want to provide detailed content about your app, consider providing a link to a support web page at the end of your Help content.
trans-unit.target: If you want to provide detailed content about your app, consider providing a link to a support web page at the end of your Help content.

trans-unit.source: Don't use Help to notify customers that a newer version of the app is available.
trans-unit.target: Don't use Help to notify customers that a newer version of the app is available.

trans-unit.source: Allow users to access Help from the Settings page.
trans-unit.target: Allow users to access Help from the Settings page.
